full_threads.body:
Hi Rica,

Thanks for updating. I have a couple of minor changes.

Can you please make it the 2 of the 3 images that rotate so it's up more often.

Can you add the Stella x FIgur logo lock up together. (image below shows how the lock up should look)

Where the copy says:

Car insurance
unapologetically for women

Make the switch and #DRIVELIKEABOSS with Stella.

Can you change to:

Figur x Stella

Treat yourself with a Gift

The learn more URL for the click through is incorrect it should be stellainsurance.com.au/figur

Sorry that was my typo.

Thanks

Anita
